name: We met in Spring
description:
This game is about an old man's journey to deliver some blue flowers to someone very important to him.
The player will be able to Remember the old man's past... and help him in his mission.
.
A Game by: Matteo Devitini Casnedi, Mattia Beffa, Lorenzo Baldassi
Graphic:   Giulia Zoggia
Code:      Luca Casagrande, Luca Giacomini
Music:     Federico Corbani
